root.name: Zoids 2: Zenebasu no Gyakushuu
root.description: OverviewZoids 2: Zenebasu no Gyakushuu is the sequel to the original NES Zoids game and also features characters from the Zoids model-kit toy series from Tomy (now Takara-Tomy). Zoids 2 also features the same developer/publisher combo of Micronics and Toshiba-EMI.As with the first NES Zoids, Zoids 2 is an RPG of the Dragon Quest variety that switches to first-person shooter battles when fighting other Zoids. The world of Zoids 2 is still every bit as incongruously medieval as the first game's world.
